QuestData.Title: Meet with Mulric Boldrock
QuestData.Description: Mulric Boldrock's messenger just reached me, $n. He has an important matter he wishes to discuss with you and sends word that you should meet him at the Training Hall in the Old Town district in Stormwind as soon as you can make it there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Mulric Boldrock at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Mulric Boldrock at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
